channel.title: Comments on: Coachella 08 – Portishead, Love and Rockets, and more…

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: good point! I guess they blew it off. Aren't they playing some shows this summer?
item.content:encoded: good point! I guess they blew it off. Aren’t they playing some shows this summer?

item.title: By: Big City Sheep
item.dc:creator: Big City Sheep
item.description: Is this the festival where My Bloody Valentine was supposed to reunite?
item.content:encoded: Is this the festival where My Bloody Valentine was supposed to reunite?

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
Eric seems to think this is a bad lineup. And to some degree, he's right. The Headliners aren't all that impressive. But like I told him, I've never really gone for the Headliners. I did enjoy Depeche Mode and Daft Punk in '06, but I can't even remember who headlined in '02 (though I do recall seeing Sigur Ros and Squarepusher. Both were amazing. I also remember Blonde Redhead canceled and Aphex Twin as well. sigh.)
I'm not likely to make it to Coachella this year, but if I were to attend, I would want to see:
Day 1: Stars, Battles, Mum, Jens Lekman, Architecture in Helsinki, Sharon Jones, Madness, Campire Weekend, The National
Day 2: Portishead, Kraftwerk, Death Cab, Rilo Kiley, M.I.A., Hot Chip, Cold War Kids, Cinematic Orchestra, Teenagers, VHS or Beta, MGMT, Bird and the Bee
Day 3: Love and Rockets, Spiritualized, Justice, Gogol, Chromeo, The Streets, Metric, Dimitri, Sons & Daughters, Black Kids, I'm From Barcelona
I think that is pretty on par with previous coachella's (excluding the obvious years with mega-stars like Radiohead and The Pixies as headliners).
item.content:encoded:
Eric seems to think this is a bad lineup. And to some degree, he’s right. The Headliners aren’t all that impressive. But like I told him, I’ve never really gone for the Headliners. I did enjoy Depeche Mode and Daft Punk in ’06, but I can’t even remember who headlined in ’02 (though I do recall seeing Sigur Ros and Squarepusher. Both were amazing. I also remember Blonde Redhead canceled and Aphex Twin as well. sigh.)

I’m not likely to make it to Coachella this year, but if I were to attend, I would want to see:

Day 1: Stars, Battles, Mum, Jens Lekman, Architecture in Helsinki, Sharon Jones, Madness, Campire Weekend, The National

Day 2: Portishead, Kraftwerk, Death Cab, Rilo Kiley, M.I.A., Hot Chip, Cold War Kids, Cinematic Orchestra, Teenagers, VHS or Beta, MGMT, Bird and the Bee

Day 3: Love and Rockets, Spiritualized, Justice, Gogol, Chromeo, The Streets, Metric, Dimitri, Sons & Daughters, Black Kids, I’m From Barcelona

I think that is pretty on par with previous coachella’s (excluding the obvious years with mega-stars like Radiohead and The Pixies as headliners).
